title: The number pi has an evil twin
author: pkaeding
aiHeadline: Breaking News: The Number Pi Has an Evil Twin, Because Math Wasn't Already Complicated Enough, Now We Have to Worry About Pi's Doppelganger Causing Chaos in the World of Geometry and Beyond

title: 38th Chaos Communication Congress
author: joeig
aiHeadline: Get Ready for the 38th Chaos Communication Congress, Where Hackers and Tech Enthusiasts Gather to Unleash Their Inner Chaos and Possibly Take Over the World, or at Least the Internet, with Their Ingeniousness and Creativity

title: macOS menu bar app that shows how full the ISS urine tank is in real time
author: ajdude
aiHeadline: Because You Clearly Didn't Have Enough Ways to Waste Time on Your Mac, Someone Created a Menu Bar App that Shows the Fill Level of the ISS Urine Tank in Real-Time, Because Who Doesn't Want to Know How Full the Space Station's Toilet is at All Times?

title: Tokyo released point cloud data of the entire city for free
author: taubek
aiHeadline: In a Move that Will Either Revolutionize Urban Planning or Create a New Form of Digital Tourism, Tokyo Has Released Point Cloud Data of the Entire City for Free, So You Can Now Explore the City's Every Nook and Cranny from the Comfort of Your Own Home

title: Intel shareholders file case asking ex CEO, CFO to return 3 years of salary
author: YetAnotherNick
aiHeadline: Karma's a Boomerang: Intel Shareholders Are Suing the Company's Ex-CEO and CFO, Demanding They Return Three Years' Worth of Salary, Because Apparently, They Didn't Do a Great Job of, You Know, Not Tanking the Company
